title: Lynda - Designing an Illustrated Book
description:
Lynda - Designing an Illustrated Book

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 30m Intermediate Aug 12, 2015 | Uploaded in Oct 8, 2015 Via Webcentara

Subject: Design 
Software: InDesign 
Author: Nigel French 

Learn how to design an illustrated book, like a cookbook, children's book, or art book, with InDesign, Illustrator, and Photoshop. Nigel French helps you assemble text, photos, and infographics into a stunning layout with front and back covers. Along the way, he dives into the nuts and bolts of working with paragraph, character, and object styles, and captions, grids, headers, and master pagesâ€”all the elements that make designing an illustrated book such a challenge. At the end of the course, he'll help you prepare two versions of the book: one for print, and one for digital publication.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Setting up the document
	â€¢	Creating layers and a grid
	â€¢	Building a color palette
	â€¢	Adding master pages
	â€¢	Setting up paragraph styles and GREP styles
	â€¢	Creating and placing images
	â€¢	Designing the cover
	â€¢	Adding an infographic
	â€¢	Creating section heads, footers, and a table of contents
	â€¢	Exporting a PDF and an EPUB
